name: Golden Guy in a Dungeon
description:
Made for the PSP Awakening 2020 GameJam

IT'S LAGGING ON A REAL PSP.
I don't have enought time to fix this.
Please play this in an Emulator ;-;

This is a simple, unfinished gamejam entry and totally not a cheap zelda rip-off made in GameMaker 8.1.
 
You play as a guy made out of gold. And you pay for everything with it(cuz your life is currency).
And you shoot with golden arows and stuff.

This game contains:
-broken english
-2 weapons(a sword and a bow)
-3 short maps(I didn't have time to make more or better maps)
-3 enemy types
-no puzzle elements
-no music(GM's sound looping doesn't work how it should on PSP)

In-Game Controls:
D-Pad - Movement
Cross - Sword
Square - Bow
L - Strafe
Select - Pause

Assets from other games used:
Enemy sprites - Catrap(a gameboy game)
Player and shopkeeper sprites - Final Fantasy Adventure(another gameboy game)

The rest of GFX and all the SFX were made by me.
